column1: On [[February]] [[1959]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"
column5: articlename=J.R.R. Tolkien Collection: Other Tolkien Writings, 1911-1976

column1: *'''Subject:''' Making arrangements for the transfer of money through Bertram Rota for the purchase of the original manuscripts of ''The Lord of the Rings''.
*'''Archive:''' The original letter is kept at [[Marquette University]].<ref name=Marq/>
